author: craigmcc
msg: Clean up Javadoc generation warnings under 1.4 (@return with no value and
Clean up if statements with no { } to conform to coding standards.
Change the private findDescriptor() method to void instead of boolean,
because the return value wasn't actually used for anything.

author: costin
msg: Added a target that automates most of the release steps.
The source is taken using anoncvs ( instead of doing it on cvs.apache.org ),
people could do "cvs diff" ( they only need to cvs login first ).
Also cut&pasted tomcat's download targets, to simplify dependency download.

author: costin
msg: Cut&paste from tomcat build file. Locations for the dependencies.

author: costin
msg: Added some comments on this package.
